title: Implement text input system
description: Accept text via direct paste and TXT file upload. File parsing must be client-side using FileReader API. Handle character encoding properly (UTF-8).
close_reason: Done: Already implemented - textarea for paste and FileReader API for TXT upload with UTF-8 handling

title: Support additional input formats (PDF, EPUB, DOCX)
description: Add client-side parsing for PDF (using pdf.js), EPUB, and DOCX using browser-based libraries. All parsing must happen in the browser with no server calls.
close_reason: Done: Added PDF.js and JSZip for client-side parsing of PDF, EPUB, DOCX files

title: Add alternative color mapping algorithms
description: Add Direct RGB (ASCII mod 256 for each channel), semantic grouping (similar characters get similar colors), and frequency-optimized algorithms. User-selectable in UI with algorithm indicator in output.
close_reason: Done: Added 4 color algorithms (HSL, Direct RGB, Semantic, Frequency) with UI selector

title: Implement image-to-text decoder
description: Upload TextPixel image, extract RGB values from each pixel, reconstruct original text. Display confidence indicator for lossy formats (JPEG). Must handle padding detection.
close_reason: Done: Implemented decoder with image upload, RGB extraction, confidence indicator, and padding detection

title: TextPixel MVP - Static Web Application for GitHub Pages
description: Core TextPixel application that runs entirely client-side for GitHub Pages deployment. This epic encompasses all features needed for the MVP release.

title: Add real-time preview with zoom/pan
description: Show preview as user types or uploads text. Support zoom/pan controls for large images. Hover-to-reveal character tooltip showing ASCII value and character.
close_reason: Done: Added real-time preview, zoom/pan controls, and character tooltip

title: Enable GitHub Actions for GitHub Pages deployment
description: Set up GitHub Actions workflow to automatically deploy the static site to GitHub Pages on push to master. Configure the repository settings for Pages deployment.
close_reason: Done: Added GitHub Actions workflow for automatic Pages deployment on push to master

title: Implement image generation engine
description: Generate square images using Canvas API. Calculate dimensions from sqrt(char_count), handle padding for non-square remainders. Export to PNG format. Each pixel represents one character.
close_reason: Done: Already implemented - Canvas API with sqrt dimensions, space padding, PNG export

title: Add local gallery for generated images
description: Store generated images in localStorage or IndexedDB. Allow browsing previous generations and re-downloading. Include metadata like original text length and timestamp.
close_reason: Done: Added IndexedDB-backed gallery with save, browse, re-download, and delete functionality

title: Implement character-to-color mapping engine
description: Deterministic ASCII (32-126) to RGB mapping using distributed hue algorithm. HSL formula: Hue = ((ASCII-32)/94)*360, Saturation 70%, Lightness 50%. Must be reversible for decoding.
close_reason: Done: Implemented deterministic ASCII-to-RGB mapping with reversible colorToChar for decoding

title: Set up static web project for GitHub Pages
description: Initialize project with HTML/CSS/JS (or a framework like React/Vue that builds to static files). Configure for GitHub Pages deployment. No server-side code allowed.
close_reason: Done: Created static HTML/CSS/JS project structure ready for GitHub Pages deployment
